title: What percentage of blood volume does plasma constitute for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which percentage in the total blood volume does plasma account for? This will vary roughly by individual hemotocrit and level of hydration. For example, if the hematcrit if 40%, in the presence of normal hydration, the plasma percentage can be guestimated at about 60 percent.
“Normally" that would be 55% in men and 60% in women.- but to tell in any individual you measure the hematocrit and subtract from 100.
